node.title: Alabama coach Nick Saban thinks opt-outs would turn spring football into JV - ESPN
node.description: Alabama coach Nick Saban thinks any upperclassman with an NFL grade would opt out of playing spring college football, which would become "sort of a JV season."

node.title: Parents of Big Ten players seek to make conference 'uncomfortable' on decision to postpone football season - ESPN
node.description: Randy Wade, the father of Ohio State star defensive back Shaun Wade, expects other parents to join him at Big Ten headquarters seeking answers to why the conference postponed the season.
